Original: That request is from a Vessel. It says
it wants the champion of the alliance
with the Vessels to fetch something.
[Page]
It specifically requests ice that can
be found in the [Color:5]Underground Lake[Color:0].
Could you take on this duty?
[Page]
Oh, you'll need this. It's a leather
bag designed to keep ice frozen for
[Color:5]six hours[Color:0].
[Page]
Perhaps if you are successful with
this request, it will improve Tharsis'
standing in the eyes of the Vessels.
[Page]
Try not to make too many mistakes
where they are concerned, [Guild]
Guild.
Translation: That request is from a Vessel. It says
it wants the champion of the alliance
with the Vessels to fetch something.
[Page]
It specifically requests ice that can
be found in the [Color:5]Underground Lake[Color:0].
Could you take on this duty?
[Page]
Oh, you'll need this. It's a leather
bag designed to keep ice frozen for
[Color:5]six hours[Color:0].
[Page]
Perhaps if you are successful with
this request, it will improve Tharsis'
standing in the eyes of the Vessels.
[Page]
Try not to make too many mistakes
where they are concerned, [Guild]
Guild.

Original: Welcome back. It looks like your
request for the Vessels went well.
[Page]
I hope that this will spur the Vessels
to begin using our services.
[Page]
I would like nothing more than Vessels
and explorers to find common ground in
quests. It would do much for this bar.
[Page]
Now then, I again thank you for your
hard work, and here is the reward that
the Vessel provided.
Translation: Welcome back. It looks like your
request for the Vessels went well.
[Page]
I hope that this will spur the Vessels
to begin using our services.
[Page]
I would like nothing more than Vessels
and explorers to find common ground in
quests. It would do much for this bar.
[Page]
Now then, I again thank you for your
hard work, and here is the reward that
the Vessel provided.

Original: Having accepted a request to deliver
the ice, you make Vessel Town your
first stop.
[Page]
One Vessel comes out to greet you
with a surprised look.
Translation: Having accepted a request to deliver
the ice, you make Vessel Town your
first stop.
[Page]
One Vessel comes out to greet you
with a surprised look.

Original: "You actually came. One strip of paper
has so much weight there...? That bar
is no ordinary place.
[Page]
"I want you to go to the [Color:5]Underground
Lake[Color:0] and bring me back some ice.
[Page]
"My mother, unfortunately, has a
fever. I must cool her down as soon
as I can...
[Page]
"We have no ice here. It would be very
helpful if you could get some and
bring it directly to me.
[Page]
"A lot is riding on this request."
The Vessels bows his head to you
respectfully.
Translation: "You actually came. One strip of paper
has so much weight there...? That bar
is no ordinary place.
[Page]
"I want you to go to the [Color:5]Underground
Lake[Color:0] and bring me back some ice.
[Page]
"My mother, unfortunately, has a
fever. I must cool her down as soon
as I can...
[Page]
"We have no ice here. It would be very
helpful if you could get some and
bring it directly to me.
[Page]
"A lot is riding on this request."
The Vessels bows his head to you
respectfully.

Original: He then withdraws to the village to
care for his mother. You, for your
part, set out on the request.
Translation: He then withdraws to the village to
care for his mother. You, for your
part, set out on the request.

Original: The Vessel is currently busy caring
for his mother. You don't expect that
he will emerge to speak with you.
[Page]
Having already decided to fulfill the
request, you head to the Underground
Lake.
Translation: The Vessel is currently busy caring
for his mother. You don't expect that
he will emerge to speak with you.
[Page]
Having already decided to fulfill the
request, you head to the Underground
Lake.

Original: While you cautiously search for the
Vessel's ice, you find a tall, frozen
pillar of unusually clear ice.
[Page]
Perhaps the shimmering ice is due to
its location in the very center of
the labyrinth...
[Page]
If you wish, you may put some of this
ice into the [Color:5][Item:1447][Color:0] you received
at the bar.
Translation: While you cautiously search for the
Vessel's ice, you find a tall, frozen
pillar of unusually clear ice.
[Page]
Perhaps the shimmering ice is due to
its location in the very center of
the labyrinth...
[Page]
If you wish, you may put some of this
ice into the [Color:5][Item:1447][Color:0] you received
at the bar.

Original: In front of you stands an unusually
clear pillar of ice...
[Page]
In order to complete the request you
undertook at the bar, you need to
place this ice in your bag.
Translation: In front of you stands an unusually
clear pillar of ice...
[Page]
In order to complete the request you
undertook at the bar, you need to
place this ice in your bag.

Original: You return to the clear pillar of ice,
anxious about whether the ice you took
previously has melted.
[Page]
It would soothe your worries to take
some new ice for your bag...
Translation: You return to the clear pillar of ice,
anxious about whether the ice you took
previously has melted.
[Page]
It would soothe your worries to take
some new ice for your bag...

Original: [Color:5]Cut some ice from the pillar?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Cut some ice from the pillar?[Color:0]

Original: You cut out a portion of the pillar
of ice and place it into the
[Page]
If Kirtida was correct, this ice has
a lifespan of only six hours.
[Page]
You must return to Vessel Town before
it melts in order to deliver it to
your client.
Translation: You cut out a portion of the pillar
of ice and place it into the
[Page]
If Kirtida was correct, this ice has
a lifespan of only six hours.
[Page]
You must return to Vessel Town before
it melts in order to deliver it to
your client.

Original: You decide to abandon the pillar of
ice and take your leave.
Translation: You decide to abandon the pillar of
ice and take your leave.

Original: You arrive with the ice at the town
where the client lives.
[Page]
One Vessel comes out to greet you
with a surprised look.
Translation: You arrive with the ice at the town
where the client lives.
[Page]
One Vessel comes out to greet you
with a surprised look.

Original: "You actually came. One strip of paper
has so much weight there...? That bar
is no ordinary place.
[Page]
The Vessel is even more surprised
when you hand him the [Color:5][Item:1447][Color:0]
filled with ice.
[Page]
"This is... ice! From the Underground
Lake! Amazing... it has barely melted.
This should quell my mother's fever.
[Page]
"Thank you, everyone. I have sent the
reward to a fellow of mine. You can
pick it up at the bar."
Translation: "You actually came. One strip of paper
has so much weight there...? That bar
is no ordinary place.
[Page]
The Vessel is even more surprised
when you hand him the [Color:5][Item:1447][Color:0]
filled with ice.
[Page]
"This is... ice! From the Underground
Lake! Amazing... it has barely melted.
This should quell my mother's fever.
[Page]
"Thank you, everyone. I have sent the
reward to a fellow of mine. You can
pick it up at the bar."

Original: After showing his appreciation, the
Vessel bows his head politely and
leaves with the [Item:1447].
[Page]
The request is now complete! You can
go to the bar to collect your reward
whenever you are ready.
Translation: After showing his appreciation, the
Vessel bows his head politely and
leaves with the [Item:1447].
[Page]
The request is now complete! You can
go to the bar to collect your reward
whenever you are ready.

Original: You arrive with the ice at the town
where the client lives.
[Page]
Recognizing you, the male Vessel
emerges and rushes toward you.
Translation: You arrive with the ice at the town
where the client lives.
[Page]
Recognizing you, the male Vessel
emerges and rushes toward you.

Original: "You have returned! The ice... did you
get it?"
[Page]
You answer the Vessel's worried look
by handing him the [Color:5][Item:1447][Color:0].
[Page]
"This is... ice! From the Underground
Lake! Amazing... it has barely melted.
This should quell my mother's fever.
[Page]
"Thank you, everyone. I have sent the
reward to a fellow of mine. You can
pick it up at the bar."
Translation: "You have returned! The ice... did you
get it?"
[Page]
You answer the Vessel's worried look
by handing him the [Color:5][Item:1447][Color:0].
[Page]
"This is... ice! From the Underground
Lake! Amazing... it has barely melted.
This should quell my mother's fever.
[Page]
"Thank you, everyone. I have sent the
reward to a fellow of mine. You can
pick it up at the bar."

Original: After showing his appreciation, the
Vessel bows his head politely and
leaves with the [Item:1447].
[Page]
The request is now complete! You can
go to the bar to collect your reward
whenever you are ready.
Translation: After showing his appreciation, the
Vessel bows his head politely and
leaves with the [Item:1447].
[Page]
The request is now complete! You can
go to the bar to collect your reward
whenever you are ready.

Original: You arrive with the ice at Vessel
Town, but a sudden sinking sensation
makes you look into your pack.
[Page]
The [Color:5][Item:1447][Color:0] is now empty and
your belongings are thoroughly soaked!
[Page]
It appears that the [Color:5]six hours[Color:0] since
you first collected the ice have
passed and it is now melted.
[Page]
If you intend to fulfill this request,
you must go back to the Underground
Lake for more ice.
Translation: You arrive with the ice at Vessel
Town, but a sudden sinking sensation
makes you look into your pack.
[Page]
The [Color:5][Item:1447][Color:0] is now empty and
your belongings are thoroughly soaked!
[Page]
It appears that the [Color:5]six hours[Color:0] since
you first collected the ice have
passed and it is now melted.
[Page]
If you intend to fulfill this request,
you must go back to the Underground
Lake for more ice.

Original: Debug text. Got ice on
day [Number:0], hour [Number:1], minute [Number:2].
Translation: Debug text. Got ice on
day [Number:0], hour [Number:1], minute [Number:2].

Original: Debug text. [Number:0] day(s), [Number:1] hour(s),
[Number:2] minute(s) elapsed.
Translation: Debug text. [Number:0] day(s), [Number:1] hour(s),
[Number:2] minute(s) elapsed.
